website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice for a shorter corner shelf unit that is great for counter tops.
pros: Customers love that this shelving unit doesn't require any assembly, and is a versatile way to organize a variety of spaces
It tends to be moderately sturdy and has an attractive overall look
cons: Similar to many standalone corner shelf units, upper shelves don't do well with too much weight

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I would trust this with dishes, but it's nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a plant stand on my desk. It actually arrived broken, part of the wood frame came apart at one of the corners where the dovetail didn't look like it had been put together properly. Nothing a little wood glue and some clamps couldn't fix. However, having seen this I don't think I would trust it with nice dishes in my kitchen, especially if they are the heavy ceramic ones. As a plant stand it's a nice use for a small space. It is a light bamboo color, so it should easily match other items of the same material.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J

customer_reviews.title: Broken Product
customer_reviews.text: The product came in broken. The two top shelves were severely cracked. The item came in bid exactly fitted for it covered in wrapping but it did not look very protected. The box itself had no damages but it must gotten a serious hit or blow somewhere in the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Jammy Fortin

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: It is a very cute little shelf. It fits nice on my small table and holds a small set of dishes for two people. Its is much smaller than I envisioned so I was a little disappointed that a full size dinner plate would not fit. Over all it l9is still stylish and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie Fran

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Bottom level was shattered from one leg. None of the three legs were level. I glued it together; and filed the base flat to make it work; BECAUSE; the cost of sending it back, and finding a replacement would cost too much time and energy. Thats what they rely on!!!.. DONT BUY!!!! You can make better with toothpicks and cardboard!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D.

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well, sturdy, looks and fits great
customer_reviews.text: First, the item arrived extremely well packaged. It was wrapped in a padded covering to protect it in transit. And it fit inside the box perfectly without any extra room so it wasn't moving around. The product itself is sturdy and has a smooth finish so no splinters. Looks great on my counter and fits neatly in the corner. Perfect for organizing my produce.
customer_reviews.author: Celle

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased!
customer_reviews.text: Luv this shelf. I turned it upside down and put a large bowl in the hole for an extra catch all. It really helped me organize. Great quality and very nice looking!
customer_reviews.author: N. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Dish Rack
customer_reviews.text: Good shelf dish rack. Would have liked for one level to be expandable in order to hold more plates.
customer_reviews.author: Coastie

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelf. Many uses
customer_reviews.text: Great little shelf. Excellent quality. Fits nicely on top of my kitchen cabinet in the corner where I can store fruit and bread. Really happy I purchased it. I could see using it to store plates or to organize tea possibly in the future. Would be great in a bathroom as well
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cefalu

customer_reviews.title: Not my recommendation!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this as it's not at all strong. Had a couple of things on the top shelf and it already started caving in after two days... I tried using a glue gun to keep it together but it looks warped.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The wood corner caddy is nicely made. It you have low cabinets it will not work well, but if you have a higher cabinet it fits nicely on the counter. It will not hold large spices. I placed it in the bathroom on the counter area to hold some essential items. An shelf that can be used in many different rooms. Since it's a light wood it goes with an decor.
customer_reviews.author: sbrady

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I still am not sure what to do with this, but everything I've tried has looked wonderful. Fiesta bowls, lovely! Small Fiesta plates -- divine. Fiesta bowls, beatitude. Which one is best? Got me. Add to that perfect packaging and fast shipping, and ya gotta wonder, what could be wrong with that? Not a thing!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something to keep our kitchen a little bit more organized. This was a great purchase and we use it to store bottles of oil and our salt & pepper shakers as well as aluminum foil, ziplocks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Westwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, nicely finished. I have a set of heavy pasta dishes on top, as they won't fit lower due to the overall height, but sets of plates fit below just fine. Hope the top holds the heavier bowl and will let you know later if the wood starts sagging.
customer_reviews.author: The MTS Family

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A little chunky but it is a nice holder - strong and perfect for organizing the dinner table at family get-togethers! It'll make our serving table look less cluttered! We'll definitely be using this at our next family get-together!
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior2017

customer_reviews.title: Weak, flimsy product broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of junk -- this is flimsier than one could imagine and arrived broken in two places -- if it was intact, it would be a huge surprise to me if it could hold the dishes pictured, unless they aren't made of a standard material -- I got a refund from amazon and purchased the Grayline 40316 Corner Helper Shelf instead --  -- for about half the price. It's not much for looks but fine for inside a cabinet, at least it works well and holds the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Rifkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wooden storage corner :)
customer_reviews.text: Very good and stable product. Fits perfectly very well in the kitchen and best suited for the corners. The wooden design looks awesome. I can easily put a lot of stuff that use to be scattered on the shelf and helps to easily locate the daily use items in one place.. highly recommended product!! Great quality .. very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Stand - Using in bathroom as toiletry organizer
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and arrived undamaged. It had some light foam wrapping around the edges for protection. I am using this stand in my bathroom and put the open area on the bottom. It holds a lot and has had no problems with the weight of lotions and jars. It would not stand up to using a pump lotion on top of the slats though.
customer_reviews.author: LDP

customer_reviews.title: Handy corner cabinet organizer for dishes
customer_reviews.text: Matches my cabinets perfectly, so looks like a built in. Very substantial and attractive. Worth the extra money versus the same item in white covered metal. I use it for the small items, that were always falling over, like individual flan/pudding/souffle cups. Very nice addition to my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: VA Peach

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love our new shelf for our kitchen. Fits all of our bread products and is made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rogus

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the corner next to the stove. I'm using it for cast iron skillets. No assembly required.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality item, well constructed and attractive. Use mine upside down on the countertop. Pretty dinner plate over top opening holds fresh fruits, garlic and onions and avocados on middle rack, and potatoes on bottom. Ordered a second one! Really like it. Will look for other products by Lipper.
customer_reviews.author: Mw

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about ordering this product after reading all the negative reviews...but, very glad i went ahead with the order! Product arrived yesterday and rack was very carefully packaged to prevent shipping damage as well as the rack was tightly shrink wrapped. Upon close examination, the rack was VERY high QUALITY!!! I honestly am surprised it didn't cost considerably more. I installed silicone feet to keep it from sliding on my desk, and installed my headphone amplifier, DAC, and alarm clock on it. VERY SATISFIED !!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Subpar quality.
customer_reviews.text: It came slightly damaged. I had to restick done bamboo parts together (almost seeming they didn’t fit as they were shorter). I don’t think the pieces were measured correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spent this much money on a shelf that will sit in my cupboard, but I’m very happy with it. It’s sturdy and looks great. Nice quality! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Works for me and fits nicely in my cabinet. My full size plates barely fit though and not sure each level would be big enough if I had a full set of dishes. Looks great though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Five stars and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I just had to answer some of the bad reviews. First, the packaging was protected and secure and the item received perfectly. You could tell prior to purchase that it wouldn’t hold a huge amount of heavy plates. It’s made very well and sweet and adorable. An addition to any kitchen. It’s actually slightly toI tall for where I wanted it and should send it back. But I’m in love with it so I’m looking for another spot. Love bamboo!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lipman

customer_reviews.title: What a headache!
customer_reviews.text: Really thin wood. I wouldn't place anything breakable on the shelves. First shipment arrived damaged. Second shipment had a shelf missing. I just kept it reason being was the shape and size is perfect for what I needed. The missing shelf was on the bottom didn't matter. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charles S

customer_reviews.title: I like the cork top
customer_reviews.text: Adds functionality for cabinets, more storage space without having to stack things. One thing though - due to hinge design in my kitchen, this only worked on the left side of my cabinets. The gap left by the uprights made it work but to use on the right side meant no gap and the hinges conflict with it. I rearranged things so I don't use them on the right side, it worked out. Don't order too many until you know whether it will work with your cabinets. I like the cork top, it softens sounds and keeps things where you put them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Brosemer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for counter top organisation
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what i needed for my kitchen counter top. I used it to organize the small stuff that is always hanging around.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little shelf...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little shelf for the price. I bought a second one the day after receiving the first. Using both in a kitchen cabinet to organize dish ware, but this could have many uses. Be aware of measurements if using it inside a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: UncommynThreads

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! Attractive! AND it solved my paper/foam kid plate issues in my over-crowded cabinet! Now sits in corner on counter, convenient to microwave and fridge. Beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good if it arrives unbroken.
customer_reviews.text: Lucky delivery goons didn't destroy it. Needs double boxing. Unit fits tight to box walls. Not intelligent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised, the quality was better than expected. Appears sturdy, so far this stand is working out well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The wood was warped and rocks back and forth when ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood was warped and rocks back and forth when put on a flat surface. I can fix it, but it should not have come in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Henderson

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a charging station.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a charging station for cell phones and such. My family's electronics we're all over my counter at any given moment, taking up numerous outlets. I ordered this because it matches other gadgets I have on my counter, it slides into a corner, taking up very little room. It looks nice on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Tesi

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, functional and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for holding our dishes. It’s MUCH sturdier than a chrome plate-holder I have (which bends under the weight).
customer_reviews.author: JaneInTexas

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my cups. It wobbles a bit, must have been misaligned. The look is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: NGUYEN, KENNY

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Really like this corner shelf. It is a good quality, nicely made and sanded/finished. Fits perfectly in the spot I wanted it for and hold quite a lot.
customer_reviews.author: mcerner

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great for plates - sturdy and much nicer than the white plastic versions
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: good quality good price too!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality; did not need assembly; using this item in my beach camper behind the sink; You will enjoy having this functional shelf ;
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs. Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Live in apartment, no cabinet room for dishes. Serves my needs perfectly. Just hope they hold up for at least a year or 2. Or 3?
customer_reviews.author: Melonie Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: cute design and fit into my cabinets perfectly. Gave me so much more space and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kmchi

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute and just the right size for storing tea boxes. It seems sturdy despite two of the panels on the second shelf being too short (or broken) and not reaching one border of the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Constanze

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and well made
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style. Looks so much better than all the other metal shelves. Can be used in a cabinet or out on a counter top.
customer_reviews.author: T. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Nice but tilts to the front...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, fully assembled. My only complaint is that it's wobbly in terms of how it sits on a flat surface. Mine tilts to the front. The shelves are pretty sturdy though. Good if not used for heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia182

customer_reviews.title: stands nice and solid in our cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't wobble around when you take the pans out or put them back in
customer_reviews.author: Amy Paegel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible I received a SMASHED BOx with hundred sticks inside A Joke!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: USE IT MY KITCHEN FOR VARIOUS SMALL ITEMS ON THE COUNTER.
customer_reviews.author: matthias waters

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big bamboo fan so this fit in on my kitchen counter very nicely and helped to organize some items. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A simple item, a simple review. No flaws in the one I got. Attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty wood spice holder but limited size
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated. Call it put spices on edge because of lip in construction.
customer_reviews.author: Super-fan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality shelving unit and looks great on my kitchen countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G.

customer_reviews.title: Great little organizer. I ended up getting 3
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 shelf Bamboo bookshelf and I wanted to have something that would utilize the space to the upper part of the shelf (I'm not using the bookshelf for books but for stuff such as note pads printer paper etc) and these work really well. Arrived packed well with no damage. Price is good too
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: came undone in box, but was able to put back together. Not as substantial as it appears
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Attractive organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought several and they work great in the kitchen, bath and entry!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really has opened up space on my counter and looks upscale
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen organizing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my kitchen corner to keep a flat food scale, tea utensils, small trays and wine utensils within easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: spineastnyc

customer_reviews.title: Solid, attractive organizer, fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this item was a little overpriced--but I'm very happy with it. It's very solid and much sturdier than I expected, so still giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Fierce

customer_reviews.title: like it but would not by again
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, and loved it but had 1 complaint, top shelf is a bit shaky and not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: LGB

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Functional
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition to my cabinet, it makes it easy to stack dishes without having to lift the top stack off the next stack to get what you want! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G.

customer_reviews.title: I won't chance buying another one
customer_reviews.text: The first shelf arrived broken, the one received to replace it one of the slats was flopping around in the box . Rather than returning it & chancing the 3rd one would be better I just glued the slat into place & called it a day.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl K Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These are great for stacking plates behind a glass cabinet door. Looks so much better than metal racks. I ordered 8, one edge came loose but I glued it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Palmetto

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Nice shelf however it didn’t work in my space. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Trying to limit things on bathroom counters can be difficult but this allows all the important bathroom necessities (floss, toothpaste, q-tips, etc.) be able to be easily found without guests rummaging through your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good product but it didn’t fit my needs,
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product. I wanted to use it as a corner stand in my bathroom. There was nothing wrong with it but I didn’t like the way it fit in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: B. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect in the corner of the kitchen counter
customer_reviews.text: Using for smaller items I wouldn’t recommend anything superheavy on it
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I had one of these and loved how it provided more room in my china cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these and loved how it provided more room in my china cabinet, so I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Dietsch

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely in my cupboard
customer_reviews.text: Gave me the extra plate and bowl space I needed. Fits nicely in my cupboard
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: This item was well sized and well made. Its looks were good too. No defects. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: justahelper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Perfect accent that helps add some vertical organization space for the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Stophenstein

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was a happy find. I saw another review flip it and put a bowl on the top and that was a great idea! Sturdy and well made. Shipping and packaging was great. I only wish the distance between shelves were a tad bigger for more room! Will purchase more for other storage areas :)
customer_reviews.author: H. Chase

customer_reviews.title: It's even nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: Using it on my cabinet to help organize it really looks nice I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This was intended for an awkward corner countertop. It's very strong and holds a heavy cast iron dutch oven. However, it's smaller than expected, so not much fits in the shelves below... so they've been resigned to hold a number of scrubbing brushes and a sponge. I wish the distance between the shelves was a little more. Might also be nice in a bathroom, but not quite enough for kitchen help.
customer_reviews.author: DePhi

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than hoped; hardly large enough to store anything.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than hoped; hardly large enough to store anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sun Flower

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: The openings aren’t even big enough for bread. What are you supposed to store

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as it looks in the photo and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as it looks in the photo and very attractive. I'm not sure why there is no shelf on the bottom tier though.
customer_reviews.author: Self Help Guru

customer_reviews.title: it is what suits my kitchen space better, i dont like to have alot of clutter ...
customer_reviews.text: it is what suits my kitchen space better , i dont like to have alot of clutter in my counters so it gives me enough space to keep just what is needed on a daily basis, love my little corner unit.
customer_reviews.author: Maria a lara

customer_reviews.title: nice but ... .
customer_reviews.text: started to "sag" on one side. I just hope it does not break

customer_reviews.title: Quite handy shelf
customer_reviews.text: I used this for counter storage. Better than a breadbox!

customer_reviews.title: Safe arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Because of the negative reviews, I almost didn't purchase this, but I'm so glad I did. The shelf arrived in a thick cardboard box and inside it was wrapped in a pliable foam cushion. It looks perfect and is exactly what I needed for my veggies.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fits a full set of large plates, small plates and bowls perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price! I’m so happy with the product :) I could organize my dishes easily!

customer_reviews.title: Good for the random small corner items
customer_reviews.text: Good for the random small corner items. I use mine for k cups and some other small kitchen items.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, handy little shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little shelf really helped dress up a corner of the kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great use of kitchen counter space
customer_reviews.text: Great for storing breads in the corner of our kitchen. Just wish the height between the tiers was slightly larger - bread loafs and burger buns have to be squeezed into the center and lower tiers.

customer_reviews.title: need lots of space above top shelf.
customer_reviews.text: if you don't have tall shelves you won't be able to feel anything on the top rack. otherwise , it works great .

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the corner we got our Vitamins in it

customer_reviews.title: Just as beautiful as shown

customer_reviews.title: One of the shelves broke apart right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the shelves broke apart right out of the box. Tips over when you put anything on it. I'm thinking about sending it back, because I honestly don't think it can hold anything but pill bottles.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: As some have pointed out, they are a little ...

customer_reviews.text: I keep this on my counter to hold my most-used plates and bowls. It doesn't take up much room, and it keeps dishes handy and looks good.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My only caution is that it's not adjustable. Make sure it's the right size for where you want to use it.

customer_reviews.title: So PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo is the perfect perfect material for the kitchen. I was looking for shelving and I didn't want anything metal. I saw this and just fell in love with it! It fits perfectly in the corner and I stack my items on it. Such a smart/functional item!

customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my camper to save space and I love it. It doesn't move around in cubbard and fits all of my camping dishes.

product_meta.title: Lipper International 8883 Bamboo Wood 3-Tier Corner Kitchen Storage Shelf, 10" x 10" x 9-1/2"
product_meta.description: Style:3-TierLipper International provides exceptionally valued items for the kitchen, home, office, and child's playroom. Known for their functionality and beauty, each of our products is individually crafted from the finest quality materials. Add more space to your cabinets with this three-tier corner shelf. Made of bamboo wood. No assembly required. Hand wash only.
feature_bullets: Add more space to your cabinets with this three-tier corner shelf.
Perfect for organizing plates and bowls.
Also great in the linen closet to organize hand towels.
Handsome enough to use on counters too!

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
